00138 enum OpenRAVEErrorCode {
00139     ORE_Failed=0,
00140     ORE_InvalidArguments=1,
00141     ORE_EnvironmentNotLocked=2,
00142     ORE_CommandNotSupported=3, 
00143     ORE_Assert=4,
00144     ORE_InvalidPlugin=5, 
00145     ORE_InvalidInterfaceHash=6, 
00146     ORE_NotImplemented=7, 
00147     ORE_InconsistentConstraints=8, 
00148 };
00149 
00151 class OPENRAVE_API openrave_exception : public std::exception
00152 {
00153 public:
00154     openrave_exception() : std::exception(), _s("unknown exception"), _error(ORE_Failed) {
00155     }
00156     openrave_exception(const std::string& s, OpenRAVEErrorCode error=ORE_Failed) : std::exception() {
00157         _error = error;
00158         _s = "openrave (";
00159         switch(_error) {
00160         case ORE_Failed: _s += "Failed"; break;
00161         case ORE_InvalidArguments: _s += "InvalidArguments"; break;
00162         case ORE_EnvironmentNotLocked: _s += "EnvironmentNotLocked"; break;
00163         case ORE_CommandNotSupported: _s += "CommandNotSupported"; break;
00164         case ORE_Assert: _s += "Assert"; break;
00165         case ORE_InvalidPlugin: _s += "InvalidPlugin"; break;
00166         case ORE_InvalidInterfaceHash: _s += "InvalidInterfaceHash"; break;
00167         case ORE_NotImplemented: _s += "NotImplemented"; break;
00168         default:
00169             _s += boost::str(boost::format("%8.8x")%static_cast<int>(_error));
00170             break;
00171         }
00172         _s += "): ";
00173         _s += s;
00174     }
00175     virtual ~openrave_exception() throw() {
00176     }
00177     char const* what() const throw() {
00178         return _s.c_str();
00179     }
00180     const std::string& message() const {
00181         return _s;
00182     }
00183     OpenRAVEErrorCode GetCode() const {
00184         return _error;
00185     }
00186 private:
00187     std::string _s;
00188     OpenRAVEErrorCode _error;
00189 };
00190 
00191 class OPENRAVE_LOCAL CaseInsensitiveCompare
00192 {
00193 public:
00194     bool operator() (const std::string & s1, const std::string& s2) const
00195     {
00196         std::string::const_iterator it1=s1.begin();
00197         std::string::const_iterator it2=s2.begin();
00198 
00199         //has the end of at least one of the strings been reached?
00200         while ( (it1!=s1.end()) && (it2!=s2.end()) )  {
00201             if(::toupper(*it1) != ::toupper(*it2)) {     //letters differ?
00202                 // return -1 to indicate 'smaller than', 1 otherwise
00203                 return ::toupper(*it1) < ::toupper(*it2);
00204             }
00205             //proceed to the next character in each string
00206             ++it1;
00207             ++it2;
00208         }
00209         std::size_t size1=s1.size(), size2=s2.size();     // cache lengths
00210         //return -1,0 or 1 according to strings' lengths
00211         if (size1==size2) {
00212             return 0;
00213         }
00214         return size1<size2;
00215     }
00216 };

00247 inline std::string ChangeTextColor (int attribute, int fg, int bg)
00248 {
00249     char command[13];
00250     sprintf (command, "%c[%d;%d;%dm", 0x1B, attribute, fg + 30, bg + 40);
00251     return command;
00252 }
00253 
00255 inline std::string ChangeTextColor (int attribute, int fg)
00256 {
00257     char command[13];
00258     sprintf (command, "%c[%d;%dm", 0x1B, attribute, fg + 30);
00259     return command;
00260 }
00261 
00263 inline std::string ResetTextColor()
00264 {
00265     char command[12];
00266     sprintf (command, "%c[0;38;48m", 0x1B);
00267     return command;
00268 }
00269 
00270 inline std::wstring ChangeTextColorW (int attribute, int fg)
00271 {
00272     wchar_t command[13];
00273     swprintf (command, 13, L"%c[%d;%dm", 0x1B, attribute, fg + 30);
00274     return command;
00275 }
00276 
00277 inline std::wstring RavePrintTransformString(const wchar_t* fmt)
00278 {
00279     std::vector<int> positions;
00280     std::wstring str = fmt;
00281     wchar_t* p = wcsstr(&str[0], L"%s");
00282     while(p != NULL ) {
00283         positions.push_back((int)(p-&str[0])+1);
00284         p = wcsstr(p+2, L"%s");
00285     }
00286 
00287     p = wcsstr(&str[0], L"%S");
00288     while(p != NULL ) {
00289         p[1] = 's';
00290         p = wcsstr(p+2, L"%S");
00291     }
00292 
00293     p = wcsstr(&str[0], L"%ls");
00294     while(p != NULL ) {
00295         p[1] = 's';
00296         p[2] = ' ';
00297         p = wcsstr(p+2, L"%ls");
00298     }
00299 
00300     for(int i = 0; i < (int)positions.size(); ++i)
00301         str[positions[i]] = 'S';
00302     return str;
00303 }

00305 enum DebugLevel {
00306     Level_Fatal=0,
00307     Level_Error=1,
00308     Level_Warn=2,
00309     Level_Info=3,
00310     Level_Debug=4,
00311     Level_Verbose=5,
00312     Level_OutputMask=0xf,
00313     Level_VerifyPlans=0x80000000, 
00314 };

00316 #define OPENRAVECOLOR_FATALLEVEL 5 // magenta
00317 #define OPENRAVECOLOR_ERRORLEVEL 1 // red
00318 #define OPENRAVECOLOR_WARNLEVEL 3 // yellow
00319 #define OPENRAVECOLOR_INFOLEVEL 0 // black
00320 #define OPENRAVECOLOR_DEBUGLEVEL 2 // green
00321 #define OPENRAVECOLOR_VERBOSELEVEL 4 // blue

00330 inline const char* RaveGetSourceFilename(const char* pfilename)
00331 {
00332     if( pfilename == NULL ) {
00333         return "";
00334     }
00335     const char* p0 = strrchr(pfilename,'/');
00336     const char* p1 = strrchr(pfilename,'\\');
00337     const char* p = p0 > p1 ? p0 : p1;
00338     if( p == NULL ) {
00339         return pfilename;
00340     }
00341     return p+1;
00342 }

00346 #define DefineRavePrintfW(LEVEL) \
00347     inline int RavePrintfW ## LEVEL(const wchar_t *fmt, ...) \
00348     { \
00349         /*ChangeTextColor (stdout, 0, OPENRAVECOLOR##LEVEL);*/ \
00350         va_list list; \
00351         va_start(list,fmt); \
00352         int r = vwprintf(OpenRAVE::RavePrintTransformString(fmt).c_str(), list); \
00353         va_end(list); \
00354         /*ResetTextColor (stdout);*/ \
00355         return r; \
00356     }

00358 #define DefineRavePrintfA(LEVEL) \
00359     inline int RavePrintfA ## LEVEL(const std::string& s) \
00360     { \
00361         if((s.size() == 0)||(s[s.size()-1] != '\n')) {  \
00362             printf("%s\n", s.c_str()); \
00363         } \
00364         else { \
00365             printf ("%s", s.c_str()); \
00366         } \
00367         return s.size(); \
00368     } \
00369     \
00370     inline int RavePrintfA ## LEVEL(const char *fmt, ...) \
00371     { \
00372         /*ChangeTextColor (stdout, 0, OPENRAVECOLOR##LEVEL);*/ \
00373         va_list list; \
00374         va_start(list,fmt); \
00375         int r = vprintf(fmt, list); \
00376         va_end(list); \
00377         /*if( fmt[0] != '\n' ) { printf("\n"); }*/  \
00378         /*ResetTextColor(stdout);*/ \
00379         return r; \
00380     }

00382 inline int RavePrintfA(const std::string& s, uint32_t level)
00383 {
00384     if((s.size() == 0)||(s[s.size()-1] != '\n')) { // automatically add a new line
00385         printf("%s\n", s.c_str());
00386     }
00387     else {
00388         printf ("%s", s.c_str());
00389     }
00390     return s.size();
00391 }
00392 
00393 DefineRavePrintfW(_INFOLEVEL)
00394 DefineRavePrintfA(_INFOLEVEL)
00395 
00396 #else
00397 
00398 #define DefineRavePrintfW(LEVEL) \
00399     inline int RavePrintfW ## LEVEL(const wchar_t *wfmt, ...) \
00400     { \
00401         va_list list; \
00402         va_start(list,wfmt); \
00403         /* Allocate memory on the stack to avoid heap fragmentation */ \
00404         size_t allocsize = wcstombs(NULL, wfmt, 0)+32; \
00405         char* fmt = (char*)alloca(allocsize); \
00406         strcpy(fmt, ChangeTextColor(0, OPENRAVECOLOR ## LEVEL,8).c_str()); \
00407         snprintf(fmt+strlen(fmt),allocsize-16,"%S",wfmt); \
00408         strcat(fmt, ResetTextColor().c_str()); \
00409         int r = vprintf(fmt, list);        \
00410         va_end(list); \
00411         return r; \
00412     }
00413 
00414 // In linux, only wprintf will succeed, due to the fwide() call in main, so
00415 // for programmers who want to use regular format strings without
00416 // the L in front, we will take their regular string and widen it
00417 // for them.
00418 inline int RavePrintfA_INFOLEVEL(const std::string& s)
00419 {
00420     if((s.size() == 0)||(s[s.size()-1] != '\n')) {     // automatically add a new line
00421         printf("%s\n", s.c_str());
00422     }
00423     else {
00424         printf ("%s", s.c_str());
00425     }
00426     return s.size();
00427 }
00428 
00429 inline int RavePrintfA_INFOLEVEL(const char *fmt, ...)
00430 {
00431     va_list list;
00432     va_start(list,fmt);
00433     int r = vprintf(fmt, list);
00434     va_end(list);
00435     //if( fmt[0] != '\n' ) { printf("\n"); }
00436     return r;
00437 }

00439 #define DefineRavePrintfA(LEVEL) \
00440     inline int RavePrintfA ## LEVEL(const std::string& s) \
00441     { \
00442         if((s.size() == 0)||(s[s.size()-1] != '\n')) { \
00443             printf ("%c[0;%d;%dm%s%c[m\n", 0x1B, OPENRAVECOLOR ## LEVEL + 30,8+40,s.c_str(),0x1B); \
00444         } \
00445         else { \
00446             printf ("%c[0;%d;%dm%s%c[m", 0x1B, OPENRAVECOLOR ## LEVEL + 30,8+40,s.c_str(),0x1B); \
00447         } \
00448         return s.size(); \
00449     } \
00450     \
00451     inline int RavePrintfA ## LEVEL(const char *fmt, ...) \
00452     { \
00453         va_list list; \
00454         va_start(list,fmt); \
00455         int r = vprintf((ChangeTextColor(0, OPENRAVECOLOR ## LEVEL,8) + std::string(fmt) + ResetTextColor()).c_str(), list); \
00456         va_end(list); \
00457         /*if( fmt[0] != '\n' ) { printf("\n"); } */ \
00458         return r; \
00459     } \
00460 
00461 
00462 inline int RavePrintfA(const std::string& s, uint32_t level)
00463 {
00464     if( (OpenRAVE::RaveGetDebugLevel()&OpenRAVE::Level_OutputMask)>=level ) {
00465         int color = 0;
00466         switch(level) {
00467         case Level_Fatal: color = OPENRAVECOLOR_FATALLEVEL; break;
00468         case Level_Error: color = OPENRAVECOLOR_ERRORLEVEL; break;
00469         case Level_Warn: color = OPENRAVECOLOR_WARNLEVEL; break;
00470         case Level_Info: // print regular
00471             if((s.size() == 0)||(s[s.size()-1] != '\n')) { // automatically add a new line
00472                 printf ("%s\n",s.c_str());
00473             }
00474             else {
00475                 printf ("%s",s.c_str());
00476             }
00477             return s.size();
00478         case Level_Debug: color = OPENRAVECOLOR_DEBUGLEVEL; break;
00479         case Level_Verbose: color = OPENRAVECOLOR_VERBOSELEVEL; break;
00480         }
00481         if((s.size() == 0)||(s[s.size()-1] != '\n')) { // automatically add a new line
00482             printf ("%c[0;%d;%dm%s%c[0;38;48m\n", 0x1B, color + 30,8+40,s.c_str(),0x1B);
00483         }
00484         else {
00485             printf ("%c[0;%d;%dm%s%c[0;38;48m", 0x1B, color + 30,8+40,s.c_str(),0x1B);
00486         }
00487         return s.size();
00488     }
00489     return 0;
00490 }

00508 #define RAVEPRINTHEADER(LEVEL) OpenRAVE::RavePrintfA ## LEVEL("[%s:%d] ", OpenRAVE::RaveGetSourceFilename(__FILE__), __LINE__)
00509 
00510 // different logging levels. The higher the suffix number, the less important the information is.
00511 // 0 log level logs all the time. OpenRAVE starts up with a log level of 0.
00512 #define RAVELOG_LEVELW(LEVEL,level) (OpenRAVE::RaveGetDebugLevel()&OpenRAVE::Level_OutputMask)>=(level)&&(RAVEPRINTHEADER(LEVEL)>0)&&OpenRAVE::RavePrintfW ## LEVEL
00513 #define RAVELOG_LEVELA(LEVEL,level) (OpenRAVE::RaveGetDebugLevel()&OpenRAVE::Level_OutputMask)>=(level)&&(RAVEPRINTHEADER(LEVEL)>0)&&OpenRAVE::RavePrintfA ## LEVEL
00514

00784 enum IkParameterizationType {
00785     IKP_None=0,
00786     IKP_Transform6D=0x67000001,     
00787     IKP_Rotation3D=0x34000002,     
00788     IKP_Translation3D=0x33000003,     
00789     IKP_Direction3D=0x23000004,     
00790     IKP_Ray4D=0x46000005,     
00791     IKP_Lookat3D=0x23000006,     
00792     IKP_TranslationDirection5D=0x56000007,     
00793     IKP_TranslationXY2D=0x22000008,     
00794     IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D=0x33000009,

00810 class OPENRAVE_API ConfigurationSpecification
00811 {
00812 public:
00813 
00815     class OPENRAVE_API Group
00816     {
00817 public:
00818         Group() : offset(0), dof(0) {
00819         }
00820 
00821         inline bool operator==(const Group& r) const {
00822             return offset==r.offset && dof==r.dof && name==r.name && interpolation==r.interpolation;
00823         }
00824         inline bool operator!=(const Group& r) const {
00825             return offset!=r.offset || dof!=r.dof || name!=r.name || interpolation!=r.interpolation;
00826         }
00827 
00829         int offset;
00831         int dof;
00846         std::string name;
00857         std::string interpolation;
00858     };

01026 class OPENRAVE_API IkParameterization
01027 {
01028 public:
01030     typedef IkParameterizationType Type RAVE_DEPRECATED;
01031     static const IkParameterizationType Type_None RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_None;
01032     static const IkParameterizationType Type_Transform6D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_Transform6D;
01033     static const IkParameterizationType Type_Rotation3D RAVE_DEPRECATED =IKP_Rotation3D;
01034     static const IkParameterizationType Type_Translation3D RAVE_DEPRECATED =IKP_Translation3D;
01035     static const IkParameterizationType Type_Direction3D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_Direction3D;
01036     static const IkParameterizationType Type_Ray4D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_Ray4D;
01037     static const IkParameterizationType Type_Lookat3D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_Lookat3D;
01038     static const IkParameterizationType Type_TranslationDirection5D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_TranslationDirection5D;
01039     static const IkParameterizationType Type_TranslationXY2D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_TranslationXY2D;
01040     static const IkParameterizationType Type_TranslationXYOrientation3D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D;
01041     static const IkParameterizationType Type_TranslationLocalGlobal6D RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D;
01042     static const IkParameterizationType Type_NumberOfParameterizations RAVE_DEPRECATED = IKP_NumberOfParameterizations;
01043 
01044     IkParameterization() : _type(IKP_None) {
01045     }
01047     IkParameterization(const Transform &t) {
01048         SetTransform6D(t);
01049     }
01051     IkParameterization(const RAY &r) {
01052         SetRay4D(r);
01053     }
01055     IkParameterization(const Transform &t, IkParameterizationType type) {
01056         _type=type;
01057         switch(_type) {
01058         case IKP_Transform6D: SetTransform6D(t); break;
01059         case IKP_Rotation3D: SetRotation3D(t.rot); break;
01060         case IKP_Translation3D: SetTranslation3D(t.trans); break;
01061         case IKP_Lookat3D: SetLookat3D(t.trans); break;
01062         default:
01063             throw openrave_exception(str(boost::format("IkParameterization constructor does not support type 0x%x")%_type));
01064         }
01065     }
01066 
01067     inline IkParameterizationType GetType() const {
01068         return _type;
01069     }
01070     inline const std::string& GetName() const;
01071 
01073     static int GetDOF(IkParameterizationType type) {
01074         return (type>>28)&0xf;
01075     }
01077     inline int GetDOF() const {
01078         return (_type>>28)&0xf;
01079     }
01080 
01082     static int GetNumberOfValues(IkParameterizationType type) {
01083         return (type>>24)&0xf;
01084     }
01086     inline int GetNumberOfValues() const {
01087         return (_type>>24)&0xf;
01088     }
01089 
01090     inline void SetTransform6D(const Transform& t) {
01091         _type = IKP_Transform6D; _transform = t;
01092     }
01093     inline void SetRotation3D(const Vector& quaternion) {
01094         _type = IKP_Rotation3D; _transform.rot = quaternion;
01095     }
01096     inline void SetTranslation3D(const Vector& trans) {
01097         _type = IKP_Translation3D; _transform.trans = trans;
01098     }
01099     inline void SetDirection3D(const Vector& dir) {
01100         _type = IKP_Direction3D; _transform.rot = dir;
01101     }
01102     inline void SetRay4D(const RAY& ray) {
01103         _type = IKP_Ray4D; _transform.trans = ray.pos; _transform.rot = ray.dir;
01104     }
01105     inline void SetLookat3D(const Vector& trans) {
01106         _type = IKP_Lookat3D; _transform.trans = trans;
01107     }
01109     inline void SetLookat3D(const RAY& ray) {
01110         _type = IKP_Lookat3D; _transform.trans = ray.pos; _transform.rot = ray.dir;
01111     }
01112     inline void SetTranslationDirection5D(const RAY& ray) {
01113         _type = IKP_TranslationDirection5D; _transform.trans = ray.pos; _transform.rot = ray.dir;
01114     }
01115     inline void SetTranslationXY2D(const Vector& trans) {
01116         _type = IKP_TranslationXY2D; _transform.trans.x = trans.x; _transform.trans.y = trans.y; _transform.trans.z = 0; _transform.trans.w = 0;
01117     }
01118     inline void SetTranslationXYOrientation3D(const Vector& trans) {
01119         _type = IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D; _transform.trans.x = trans.x; _transform.trans.y = trans.y; _transform.trans.z = trans.z; _transform.trans.w = 0;
01120     }
01121     inline void SetTranslationLocalGlobal6D(const Vector& localtrans, const Vector& trans) {
01122         _type = IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D; _transform.rot.x = localtrans.x; _transform.rot.y = localtrans.y; _transform.rot.z = localtrans.z; _transform.rot.w = 0; _transform.trans.x = trans.x; _transform.trans.y = trans.y; _transform.trans.z = trans.z; _transform.trans.w = 0;
01123     }
01124 
01125     inline const Transform& GetTransform6D() const {
01126         return _transform;
01127     }
01128     inline const Vector& GetRotation3D() const {
01129         return _transform.rot;
01130     }
01131     inline const Vector& GetTranslation3D() const {
01132         return _transform.trans;
01133     }
01134     inline const Vector& GetDirection3D() const {
01135         return _transform.rot;
01136     }
01137     inline const RAY GetRay4D() const {
01138         return RAY(_transform.trans,_transform.rot);
01139     }
01140     inline const Vector& GetLookat3D() const {
01141         return _transform.trans;
01142     }
01143     inline const Vector& GetLookat3DDirection() const {
01144         return _transform.rot;
01145     }
01146     inline const RAY GetTranslationDirection5D() const {
01147         return RAY(_transform.trans,_transform.rot);
01148     }
01149     inline const Vector& GetTranslationXY2D() const {
01150         return _transform.trans;
01151     }
01152     inline const Vector& GetTranslationXYOrientation3D() const {
01153         return _transform.trans;
01154     }
01155     inline std::pair<Vector,Vector> GetTranslationLocalGlobal6D() const {
01156         return std::make_pair(_transform.rot,_transform.trans);
01157     }
01158 
01160 
01161     inline void SetTransform(const Transform& t) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01162         SetTransform6D(t);
01163     }
01164     inline void SetRotation(const Vector& quaternion) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01165         SetRotation3D(quaternion);
01166     }
01167     inline void SetTranslation(const Vector& trans) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01168         SetTranslation3D(trans);
01169     }
01170     inline void SetDirection(const Vector& dir) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01171         SetDirection3D(dir);
01172     }
01173     inline void SetRay(const RAY& ray) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01174         SetRay4D(ray);
01175     }
01176     inline void SetLookat(const Vector& trans) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01177         SetLookat3D(trans);
01178     }
01179     inline void SetTranslationDirection(const RAY& ray) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01180         SetTranslationDirection5D(ray);
01181     }
01182     inline const Transform& GetTransform() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01183         return _transform;
01184     }
01185     inline const Vector& GetRotation() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01186         return _transform.rot;
01187     }
01188     inline const Vector& GetTranslation() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01189         return _transform.trans;
01190     }
01191     inline const Vector& GetDirection() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01192         return _transform.rot;
01193     }
01194     inline const Vector& GetLookat() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01195         return _transform.trans;
01196     }
01197     inline const RAY GetRay() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01198         return RAY(_transform.trans,_transform.rot);
01199     }
01200     inline const RAY GetTranslationDirection() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
01201         return RAY(_transform.trans,_transform.rot);
01202     }
01204 
01205 
01207     inline dReal ComputeDistanceSqr(const IkParameterization& ikparam) const
01208     {
01209         const dReal anglemult = 0.4;     // this is a hack that should be removed....
01210         BOOST_ASSERT(_type==ikparam.GetType());
01211         switch(_type) {
01212         case IKP_Transform6D: {
01213             Transform t0 = GetTransform6D(), t1 = ikparam.GetTransform6D();
01214             dReal fcos = RaveFabs(t0.rot.dot(t1.rot));
01215             dReal facos = fcos >= 1 ? 0 : RaveAcos(fcos);
01216             return (t0.trans-t1.trans).lengthsqr3() + anglemult*facos*facos;
01217         }
01218         case IKP_Rotation3D: {
01219             dReal fcos = RaveFabs(GetRotation3D().dot(ikparam.GetRotation3D()));
01220             dReal facos = fcos >= 1 ? 0 : RaveAcos(fcos);
01221             return facos*facos;
01222         }
01223         case IKP_Translation3D:
01224             return (GetTranslation3D()-ikparam.GetTranslation3D()).lengthsqr3();
01225         case IKP_Direction3D: {
01226             dReal fcos = GetDirection3D().dot(ikparam.GetDirection3D());
01227             dReal facos = fcos >= 1 ? 0 : RaveAcos(fcos);
01228             return facos*facos;
01229         }
01230         case IKP_Ray4D: {
01231             Vector pos0 = GetRay4D().pos - GetRay4D().dir*GetRay4D().dir.dot(GetRay4D().pos);
01232             Vector pos1 = ikparam.GetRay4D().pos - ikparam.GetRay4D().dir*ikparam.GetRay4D().dir.dot(ikparam.GetRay4D().pos);
01233             dReal fcos = GetRay4D().dir.dot(ikparam.GetRay4D().dir);
01234             dReal facos = fcos >= 1 ? 0 : RaveAcos(fcos);
01235             return (pos0-pos1).lengthsqr3() + anglemult*facos*facos;
01236         }
01237         case IKP_Lookat3D: {
01238             Vector v = GetLookat3D()-ikparam.GetLookat3D();
01239             dReal s = v.dot3(ikparam.GetLookat3DDirection());
01240             if( s >= -1 ) {     // ikparam's lookat is always 1 beyond the origin, this is just the convention for testing...
01241                 v -= s*ikparam.GetLookat3DDirection();
01242             }
01243             return v.lengthsqr3();
01244         }
01245         case IKP_TranslationDirection5D: {
01246             dReal fcos = GetTranslationDirection5D().dir.dot(ikparam.GetTranslationDirection5D().dir);
01247             dReal facos = fcos >= 1 ? 0 : RaveAcos(fcos);
01248             return (GetTranslationDirection5D().pos-ikparam.GetTranslationDirection5D().pos).lengthsqr3() + anglemult*facos*facos;
01249         }
01250         case IKP_TranslationXY2D: {
01251             return (GetTranslationXY2D()-ikparam.GetTranslationXY2D()).lengthsqr2();
01252         }
01253         case IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D: {
01254             Vector v0 = GetTranslationXYOrientation3D();
01255             Vector v1 = ikparam.GetTranslationXYOrientation3D();
01256             dReal anglediff = v0.z-v1.z;
01257             if (anglediff < dReal(-PI)) {
01258                 anglediff += dReal(2*PI);
01259                 while (anglediff < dReal(-PI))
01260                     anglediff += dReal(2*PI);
01261             }
01262             else if (anglediff > dReal(PI)) {
01263                 anglediff -= dReal(2*PI);
01264                 while (anglediff > dReal(PI))
01265                     anglediff -= dReal(2*PI);
01266             }
01267             return (v0-v1).lengthsqr2() + anglemult*anglediff*anglediff;
01268         }
01269         case IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D: {
01270             std::pair<Vector,Vector> p0 = GetTranslationLocalGlobal6D(), p1 = ikparam.GetTranslationLocalGlobal6D();
01271             return (p0.first-p1.first).lengthsqr3() + (p0.second-p1.second).lengthsqr3();
01272         }
01273         default:
01274             BOOST_ASSERT(0);
01275         }
01276         return 1e30;
01277     }
01278 
01282     inline void GetValues(std::vector<dReal>::iterator itvalues) const
01283     {
01284         switch(_type) {
01285         case IKP_Transform6D:
01286             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.x;
01287             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.y;
01288             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.z;
01289             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.w;
01290             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01291             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01292             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01293             break;
01294         case IKP_Rotation3D:
01295             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.x;
01296             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.y;
01297             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.z;
01298             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.w;
01299             break;
01300         case IKP_Translation3D:
01301             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01302             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01303             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01304             break;
01305         case IKP_Direction3D:
01306             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.x;
01307             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.y;
01308             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.z;
01309             break;
01310         case IKP_Ray4D:
01311             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.x;
01312             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.y;
01313             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.z;
01314             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01315             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01316             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01317             break;
01318         case IKP_Lookat3D:
01319             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01320             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01321             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01322             break;
01323         case IKP_TranslationDirection5D:
01324             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.x;
01325             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.y;
01326             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.z;
01327             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01328             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01329             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01330             break;
01331         case IKP_TranslationXY2D:
01332             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01333             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01334             break;
01335         case IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D:
01336             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01337             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01338             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01339             break;
01340         case IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D:
01341             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.x;
01342             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.y;
01343             *itvalues++ = _transform.rot.z;
01344             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.x;
01345             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.y;
01346             *itvalues++ = _transform.trans.z;
01347             break;
01348         default:
01349             throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("does not support parameterization 0x%x", _type,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01350         }
01351     }
01352 
01353     inline void Set(std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itvalues, IkParameterizationType iktype)
01354     {
01355         _type = iktype;
01356         switch(_type) {
01357         case IKP_Transform6D:
01358             _transform.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01359             _transform.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01360             _transform.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01361             _transform.rot.w = *itvalues++;
01362             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01363             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01364             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01365             break;
01366         case IKP_Rotation3D:
01367             _transform.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01368             _transform.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01369             _transform.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01370             _transform.rot.w = *itvalues++;
01371             break;
01372         case IKP_Translation3D: {
01373             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01374             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01375             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01376             break;
01377         }
01378         case IKP_Direction3D: {
01379             _transform.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01380             _transform.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01381             _transform.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01382             break;
01383         }
01384         case IKP_Ray4D: {
01385             _transform.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01386             _transform.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01387             _transform.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01388             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01389             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01390             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01391             break;
01392         }
01393         case IKP_Lookat3D: {
01394             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01395             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01396             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01397             break;
01398         }
01399         case IKP_TranslationDirection5D:
01400             _transform.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01401             _transform.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01402             _transform.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01403             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01404             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01405             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01406             break;
01407         case IKP_TranslationXY2D: {
01408             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01409             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01410             break;
01411         }
01412         case IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D: {
01413             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01414             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01415             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01416             break;
01417         }
01418         case IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D: {
01419             _transform.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01420             _transform.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01421             _transform.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01422             _transform.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01423             _transform.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01424             _transform.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01425             break;
01426         }
01427         default:
01428             throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("does not support parameterization 0x%x", _type,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01429         }
01430     }
01431 
01432     static ConfigurationSpecification GetConfigurationSpecification(IkParameterizationType iktype);
01433     inline ConfigurationSpecification GetConfigurationSpecification() const
01434     {
01435         return GetConfigurationSpecification(GetType());
01436     }
01437 
01438 protected:
01439     Transform _transform;
01440     IkParameterizationType _type;
01441 
01442     friend IkParameterization operator* (const Transform &t, const IkParameterization &ikparam);
01443     friend OPENRAVE_API std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& O, const IkParameterization &ikparam);
01444     friend OPENRAVE_API std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& I, IkParameterization& ikparam);
01445 };
01446 
01447 inline IkParameterization operator* (const Transform &t, const IkParameterization &ikparam)
01448 {
01449     IkParameterization local;
01450     switch(ikparam.GetType()) {
01451     case IKP_Transform6D:
01452         local.SetTransform6D(t * ikparam.GetTransform6D());
01453         break;
01454     case IKP_Rotation3D:
01455         local.SetRotation3D(quatMultiply(quatInverse(t.rot),ikparam.GetRotation3D()));
01456         break;
01457     case IKP_Translation3D:
01458         local.SetTranslation3D(t*ikparam.GetTranslation3D());
01459         break;
01460     case IKP_Direction3D:
01461         local.SetDirection3D(t.rotate(ikparam.GetDirection3D()));
01462         break;
01463     case IKP_Ray4D:
01464         local.SetRay4D(RAY(t*ikparam.GetRay4D().pos,t.rotate(ikparam.GetRay4D().dir)));
01465         break;
01466     case IKP_Lookat3D:
01467         local.SetLookat3D(RAY(t*ikparam.GetLookat3D(),t.rotate(ikparam.GetLookat3DDirection())));
01468         break;
01469     case IKP_TranslationDirection5D:
01470         local.SetTranslationDirection5D(RAY(t*ikparam.GetTranslationDirection5D().pos,t.rotate(ikparam.GetTranslationDirection5D().dir)));
01471         break;
01472     case IKP_TranslationXY2D:
01473         local.SetTranslationXY2D(t*ikparam.GetTranslationXY2D());
01474         break;
01475     case IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D: {
01476         Vector v = ikparam.GetTranslationXYOrientation3D();
01477         Vector voldtrans(v.x,v.y,0);
01478         Vector vnewtrans = t*voldtrans;
01479         dReal zangle = -normalizeAxisRotation(Vector(0,0,1),t.rot).first;
01480         local.SetTranslationXYOrientation3D(Vector(vnewtrans.y,vnewtrans.y,v.z+zangle));
01481         break;
01482     }
01483     case IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D:
01484         local.SetTranslationLocalGlobal6D(ikparam.GetTranslationLocalGlobal6D().first, t*ikparam.GetTranslationLocalGlobal6D().second);
01485         break;
01486     default:
01487         throw openrave_exception(str(boost::format("does not support parameterization %d")%ikparam.GetType()));
01488     }
01489     return local;
01490 }

01493 OPENRAVE_API std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& I, IkParameterization& ikparam);

01496 enum DOFAffine
01497 {
01498     DOF_NoTransform = 0,
01499     DOF_X = 1,     
01500     DOF_Y = 2,     
01501     DOF_Z = 4,     
01502     DOF_XYZ=DOF_X|DOF_Y|DOF_Z,     
01503 
01504     // DOF_RotationX fields are mutually exclusive
01505     DOF_RotationAxis = 8,     
01506     DOF_Rotation3D = 16,     
01507 
01508     DOF_RotationQuat = 32,     
01509     DOF_RotationMask=(DOF_RotationAxis|DOF_Rotation3D|DOF_RotationQuat), 
01510     DOF_Transform = (DOF_XYZ|DOF_RotationQuat), 
01511 };

01581 inline const char* RaveGetInterfaceHash(InterfaceType type)
01582 {
01583     switch(type) {
01584     case PT_Planner: return OPENRAVE_PLANNER_HASH;
01585     case PT_Robot: return OPENRAVE_ROBOT_HASH;
01586     case PT_SensorSystem: return OPENRAVE_SENSORSYSTEM_HASH;
01587     case PT_Controller: return OPENRAVE_CONTROLLER_HASH;
01588     case PT_Module: return OPENRAVE_MODULE_HASH;
01589     case PT_InverseKinematicsSolver: return OPENRAVE_IKSOLVER_HASH;
01590     case PT_KinBody: return OPENRAVE_KINBODY_HASH;
01591     case PT_PhysicsEngine: return OPENRAVE_PHYSICSENGINE_HASH;
01592     case PT_Sensor: return OPENRAVE_SENSOR_HASH;
01593     case PT_CollisionChecker: return OPENRAVE_COLLISIONCHECKER_HASH;
01594     case PT_Trajectory: return OPENRAVE_TRAJECTORY_HASH;
01595     case PT_Viewer: return OPENRAVE_VIEWER_HASH;
01596     case PT_SpaceSampler: return OPENRAVE_SPACESAMPLER_HASH;
01597     default:
01598         throw openrave_exception("failed to find openrave interface type",ORE_InvalidArguments);
01599         return NULL;
01600     }
01601 }

01606 template <typename T>
01607 inline boost::shared_ptr<T> RaveInterfaceCast(InterfaceBasePtr pinterface)
01608 {
01609     if( !!pinterface ) {
01610         if( pinterface->GetInterfaceType() == T::GetInterfaceTypeStatic() ) {
01611             return boost::static_pointer_cast<T>(pinterface);
01612         }
01613         // encode special cases
01614         if((pinterface->GetInterfaceType() == PT_Robot)&&(T::GetInterfaceTypeStatic() == PT_KinBody)) {
01615             return boost::static_pointer_cast<T>(pinterface);
01616         }
01617     }
01618     return boost::shared_ptr<T>();
01619 }
01620 
01624 template <typename T>
01625 inline boost::shared_ptr<T const> RaveInterfaceConstCast(InterfaceBaseConstPtr pinterface)
01626 {
01627     if( !!pinterface ) {
01628         if( pinterface->GetInterfaceType() == T::GetInterfaceTypeStatic() ) {
01629             return boost::static_pointer_cast<T const>(pinterface);
01630         }
01631         // encode special cases
01632         if((pinterface->GetInterfaceType() == PT_Robot)&&(T::GetInterfaceTypeStatic() == PT_KinBody)) {
01633             return boost::static_pointer_cast<T const>(pinterface);
01634         }
01635     }
01636     return boost::shared_ptr<T>();
01637 }

01776 inline bool RaveParseDirectories(const char* pdirs, std::vector<std::string>& vdirs)
01777 {
01778     vdirs.resize(0);
01779     if( !pdirs ) {
01780         return false;
01781     }
01782     // search for all directories separated by ':'
01783     std::string tmp = pdirs;
01784     std::string::size_type pos = 0, newpos=0;
01785     while( pos < tmp.size() ) {
01786 #ifdef _WIN32
01787         newpos = tmp.find(';', pos);
01788 #else
01789         newpos = tmp.find(':', pos);
01790 #endif
01791         std::string::size_type n = newpos == std::string::npos ? tmp.size()-pos : (newpos-pos);
01792         vdirs.push_back(tmp.substr(pos, n));
01793         if( newpos == std::string::npos ) {
01794             break;
01795         }
01796         pos = newpos+1;
01797     }
01798     return true;
01799 }

01819 // define inline functions
01820 const std::string& IkParameterization::GetName() const
01821 {
01822     std::map<IkParameterizationType,std::string>::const_iterator it = RaveGetIkParameterizationMap().find(_type);
01823     if( it != RaveGetIkParameterizationMap().end() ) {
01824         return it->second;
01825     }
01826     throw openrave_exception(str(boost::format("IkParameterization iktype 0x%x not supported")));
01827 }
